ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 116
ygData.msgSnippet: what i don t get it why a bar maid can bunch of double 110 s when a monk can t.  Shes a friggin bair maid.  Is every bar maid in the game the daughter of Lu
ygData.messageBody:
what i don't get it why a bar maid can bunch of double 110's when a monk
can't. Shes a friggin bair maid. Is every bar maid in the game the
daughter of Lu Sun of Puab Closk?

Why blindness works on PC's but not NPC's...sure you can blind them and
they run around but as soon as you do damage they come right at you.

Why a derv caster at a derv camp in WCom and run and cast and keep up with
me SoWed?

Why, when Capt Linarius is fighting a Hill Giant(I was KoS in qeynos at
the time) do both Capt. Linarius and the Hill Giant stop fighting to come
after me until i zone...then they resume fighting....HELLO?

Why I can sit in an Inn or house and get the crap beat out of me through
the wall...but if a MoB is hiding behind a post and try to cast at it....i
can't see it and my spells gets screwed

(i play a caster aswell)

Why when a monster desides to run it can just continually cast shadow step
and pop around the zone...


Things i don't understand.....

Sligo
Cazic Thule
Silent Fist
